name: Passed
description:
PASSED is a solo narrative game played from a third person view. PITCH

Noah awakens in a whole cinematic universe where he's the movie star.
During an arduous journey through movie genres and classic clichés, Noah will learn to accept the torments of his life.


GAMEPLAY

In PASSED, you are Noah; a young adult wandering in a cinematic universe. Help him to make his way out and discover the truth behind his journey. 

  • Explore the spaceship
  • Discuss with all the crew members including Lamek, Noah's best friends.
  • Interact with your environment.
  • Help Noah to overcome dangerous situations.
  • Discover what is happening.
FEATURES
  • 2.5 D world : characters in pixel art (2D) in a 3D environment.
  • Story-driven game : emphasis  on environmental storytelling, dialogues and cinematics.
  • Choices during dialogues.
  • Explicit references to some iconic movie scenes. 
  • Staging inspired by movies . 
  • Great camera shots.
  • QTE Interactions.
CONTROLS  Keyboard  :

- Movements 

- Interact (with environment or NPCs) 

-Choose dialogue options

      

Controller :

DISCLAIMER

The game you are going to play is a demo designed to show the potential of our game. Feel free to give us any pieces to improve our game.

ENJOY THE GAME
